import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./DataInsert.css"; import table from "../dashboard/component/data/tabledata.json" const DataInsert = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState(table); const [addFormData, setAddFormData] = useState({ icao24: '', registration: '', manufacturericao: '', manufacturername: '', model: '', typecode: '', serialnumber: '', linenumber: '', icaoaircrafttype: '', operator: '', operatorcallsign: '', operatoricao: '', operatoriata: '', owner: '', testreg: '', registered: '', reguntil: '', built: '', firstflightdate: '', seatconfiguration: '', engines: '' }) //For Input Change const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const fieldName = event.target.getAttribute('name'); const fieldValue = event.target.value; const newFormData = {...addFormData}; newFormData[fieldName] = fieldValue; setAddFormData(newFormData); }; //for form submitting { } return (
